GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles ordered by date descending

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for specified article, ordered by date ascending

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates article with increase/decrease in votes and returns an object containing the specified updated article

exampleResponse.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment and returns an object containing the posted comment

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes specified comment and returns no content
